location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Patrick Ryan

mods.abstract: Letter requesting a telegram regarding how his reply to the Governor-General was received and requesting information on the assistants and gun-boats being sent to the Gulf.The letter also discusses horses for the Rajah; Bahrain affairs regarding the sale of a Buglah and Colonel Disbrowe's letter to Mr Johnston.
